name: Loch Ness Holiday Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have to admit to being a bit concerned about booking one of the lodges as there are no reviews as yet on Trip Advisor. I feel quite honoured to be among the first to review these stunning lodges in what must be one of the most beautiful locations in the world.
reviews.title: A Slice of Heaven at Loch Ness

description: Loch Ness Holiday Park, located in an enviable and unique position on the banks of Loch Ness, promotes a sense of community comparable to any Scottish village. It boasts a location abundant with beautiful and varied land and lochscape, a rich history and flourishes amidst the range of interests within the encompassing area.
